metadata.title: CVE-2017-9149 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Metadata Anonymisation Toolkit (MAT) 0.6 and 0.6.1 silently fails toperform "Clean metadata" actions upon invocation from the Nautiluscontextual menu, which allows context-dependent attackers to obtainsensitive information by reading a file for which cleaning had beenattempted.

criterions.comment: mat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
